headline: Significant Increase in Weekly Spending

action_items.title: Review Service Expenses
action_items.rationale: To identify areas for potential savings in the high service spending category.

action_items.title: Monitor Shopping Trends
action_items.rationale: To ensure shopping expenses remain controlled and do not escalate further.

narrative: This week saw a notable increase in spending compared to the previous week, with a total spend of $747.51, up from $142.19. However, month-to-date spending has improved, showing a decrease from last month.
email_subject: Weekly Spending Insights and Action Items
